string.value: You don't appear to be in any Pokémon league right now...

[Chaos]Doctor Fuji has been awaken by {0}! Use /join to receive one of the many wild selection of Pokémons!
You can't join now! The Pokémons are already assigned!
You are already queuing up for your Pokémon!
1 minute left to /join
{0} seconds left to /join
Not enough trainers, cancelling the Pokémon League!
Pokémon League is starting, please wait while you get your Pokémon.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, max trainer limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game.\nCurrently we have {1} trainers, we need at least {2} trainers to start the Pokémon League, max of {3}. /join now!
{0} Please click the start button below or click {1} so you can recieve your Pokémon. You may not join the Pokémon League until you do.
You can't release your Pokémon, your Pokémon already fainted!
{0} has release his/her Pokémon back to the wild!
{0} is with {1}
{0} trainers remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to start a Pokémon battle with {1}.
{0} has voted to send {1}'s Pokémon back to the wild.
{0} has not voted for 2 nights in a row. {1} thought that the trainer is not good enough and abandoned them!
Team Rocket 🐺 had lost all their members, its now your time to bring Team Rocket back to their glory!
Choice accepted.
\nThe owner of Alakazam 👳 is {0}.
{0}'s Alakazam have fainted! Your Kadabra has gained enough experience and it evolved to Alakazam!
As {1}'s Alakazam fainted, {0}'s Kadabra have evolved to Alakazam 👳!
You see that trainer {0} is with {1}!
Which trainer's Pokémon do you want to release back to the wild?
Who do you want to send your Raticate to snoop on?
Whose Pokémon should Snorlax use Hyper Beam on?? You have {0} PP left.
Which trainer do you want to be friend with?
Which trainer should Alakazam cast his Foresight on?
Which trainer should Mr. Mime cast Barrier on?
Time for Team Rocket to choose a trainer to battle! Which trainer do you want to do battle with?
Which trainer do you think owns a clone Mewtwo for Mew to cleanse?
Which trainer is your beloved senpai?
Which trainer do you want to hire into cone factory to clone more Mewtwo?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You own a Pidgeot 😾! But you always wanted to join Team Rocket (their legendary birds are stronger than your bird xD), if they come to you, you will abandon your Pidgeot to join Team Rocket.
You own a Raticate 🕵, you can send Raticate to check any trainer's Pokémon with a chance of letting the Team Rocket find out.(40% chance)
You own a Butterfree 🍻, you can ask Butterfree to cast sleeping powder on Team Rocket if they attach you.
You own a Mr. Mime 👼. You may choose a trainer to cast Barrier to protect the trainer. However, if you choose to cast on Team Rocket, there is a 50% chance that you will lose the Pokémon battle.
You own a Snorlax 🔫. Snorlax have 2 PP of Hyper Beam. You may choose to Hyper Beam another trainer's Pokémon. Everyone will see the beam and know you have a Snorlax. (Well, at least not Team Rocket).

You own a Jigglypuff 💋! Jigglypuff likes to make friends and every night, you may choose a trainer for Jigglypuff to befriend. However, if you visit Team Rocket or trainer who are battling with Team Rocket, Jigglypuff will faint. If you do send Jigglypuff out, Team Rocket is unable to battle you.

You own a Weezing 🖕! For now, you are a good trainer, but when Team Rocket falls, you will take over Team Rocket! If Alakazam cast foresight on you, you may or may not be identified as a Team Rocket member.
YOU ARE WITH TEAM ROCKET 🐺!!! You can choose a trainer to battle every day.
You own a Alakazam 👳! Every day, you can ask Alakazam to cast foresight and check the Pokémon that the trainer owns.
You own a Magikarp 👱. =( You can't win any Pokémon battle. Splashing till the end of time!
You own a Tauros 👺. You will win when you are able to set it free to the wild and destroy the Pokémon world!
You own a Meowth 👶. Choose a senpai you look up to. If he lose in a Pokémon Battle, you will lose all hope and join the Team Rocket.
You own a Abra 👁. Abra can only detect who is the trainer of Alakazam - that is Abra's only skill.
You own a Kadabra 🙇. When Alakazam fainted, your Kadabra will evolve!

You are with the cloning organisation which clones Mewtwo 👤. Every day, you may choose a trainer and try to hire him into the team to clone Mewtwo. If all the remainding Pokémons are all Mewtwo. Your evil org. wins.
You stumbled into a Mew 💂! Mew needs your help to cleanse all cloned Mewtwo.
The time is now! Time to send a Pokémon back to the wild because the trainer are too weak to handle them! Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
Hmm hmm~ All of the trainers have {0} seconds to see which trainers are not worthy to stick with their Pokémon.
Its battle time! Choose a Pokémon to battle! or increase the happiness with your Pokémon. You have {0} seconds!!
The trainers have cast their votes, and think that {0} is not worthy for {1}.
Unable to come up with a proper decision on which Pokémon to set free, all trainers went back to train their Pokémons.
All trainers are good enough for their Pokémon. No votes at all!
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Zapdos! Zapdos used Zap Cannon. {0}'s Raticate fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno! Articuno used Blizzard. {0}'s Raticate fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Moltres! Moltres used Heat Wave. {0}'s Raticate fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno, Zapdos and Moltres!!! The legendary birds used Ancient Power. {0}'s Raticate fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Zapdos! Zapdos used Zap Cannon. {0}'s Mr. Mime 👼 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno! Articuno used Blizzard. {0}'s Mr. Mime 👼 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Moltres! Moltres used Heat Wave. {0}'s Mr. Mime 👼 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno, Zapdos and Moltres!!! The legendary birds used Ancient Power. {0}'s Mr. Mime 👼 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Zapdos! Zapdos used Zap Cannon. {0}'s Snorlax fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno! Articuno used Blizzard. {0}'s Snorlax fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Moltres! Moltres used Heat Wave. {0}'s Snorlax fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno, Zapdos and Moltres!!! The legendary birds used Ancient Power. {0}'s Snorlax fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Zapdos! Zapdos used Zap Cannon. {0}'s Alakazam 👳 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno! Articuno used Blizzard. {0}'s Alakazam 👳 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Moltres! Moltres used Heat Wave. {0}'s Alakazam 👳 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno, Zapdos and Moltres!!! The legendary birds used Ancient Power. {0}'s Alakazam 👳 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Zapdos! Zapdos used Zap Cannon. {0}'s Butterfree 🍻 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno! Articuno used Blizzard. {0}'s Butterfree 🍻 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Moltres! Moltres used Heat Wave. {0}'s Butterfree 🍻 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno, Zapdos and Moltres!!! The legendary birds used Ancient Power. {0}'s Butterfree 🍻 fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno! Articuno used Mind Reader. {0}'s Alakazam have been revealed to be a Psyduck in disguise! {0} was misguided!
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Zapdos! Zapdos used Zap Cannon. {1} fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Articuno! Articuno used Blizzard. {1} fainted.
Team Rocket have found {0}. Team Rocket sent out Moltres! Moltres used Heat Wave. {1} fainted.
Mew have found out a cloned Mewtwo! Mew released the cloned Mewtwo from {0}.
There's no Pokémon Battle in the last hour.
You have been approached by Team Rocket, you decided to abandon your Pidgeot and join them!
Your Team Rocket mate(s): {0}
{0} joined Team Rocket! Congrats on your new teammate!
Team Rocket have found you and initiated a Pokémon Battle. Sadly, you lost. =(
{0}'s Butterfree casted sleeping powder on you and you slept through the next battle timing.
Mr. Mime tried to cast Barrier on the Team Rocket but their Zapdos used Zap Cannon and your Mr. Mime fainted.
Mr Mime casted Barrier on {0}'s Pokémon and successfully evaded a Pokémon Battle!
{0}'s Pokémon was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
Mr. Mime went to help {0}'s Pokémon, but unable to find it!
Mr. Mime cast Barrier on your Pokémon and able to evade a Pokémon Battle!
Jigglypuff chose the wrong Pokémon to befriend. {0}'s Jigglypuff has been attacked by the Team Rocket!
Odd... {0}'s Pokémon was not around! You cant befriend them.
Jigglypuff went to befriend {0}'s Pokémon but only to be attacked by Team Rocket! Jigglypuff fainted.
{0}'s Jigglypuff chose the wrong Pokémon to befriend! Jigglypuff fainted after a Pokémon battle with the legendary birds.
{0}'s Jigglypuff tried to befriend {1}'s Pokémon. Instead, Jigglypuff finds Team Rocket battling with {1}'s Pokémon! Moltres used Heat Wave. {0}'s Jigglypuff fainted.
Jigglypuff have befriend {0}'s Pokémon as they are not with Team Rocket. Jigglypuff returns happily.
Jigglypuff came to befriend your Pokémon and you see that they have fun playing together.
You caught {0}'s Raticate snooping about! Its time to bring it down!
Your Raticate told you that {0} is with {1}.
Suddenly, a Hyper Beam brigtness light up the whole town. {0} has ordered Snorlax 🔫 to use Hyper Beam on {1}'s Jigglypuff. Jigglypuff fainted.
Suddenly, a Hyper Beam brigtness light up the whole town. {0} has ordered Snorlax 🔫 to use Hyper Beam on {1} and {2}.
Team Rocket has won!
Team Rocket have won!
The trainers have won!
Oh no! You release Tauros 👺 back to the wild and they destroyed the whole town.
Remaining living trainers, Pokémons, and team:
{0} has voted to hire {1}
{0}'s Mewtwo was sent to lure {1} into the team... However, he/she own a Mew! {0} lost his Mewtwo and was sacked!
{0} came to you with a cloned Mewtwo trying to hire you into their evil clone factory. Mew release Mewtwo from {0}!! {1} members of the clone factory remain!
Clone factory member has come to you and lure you to join their team with a cloned Mewtwo. You abandoned your Pokémon and choose the Mewtwo. It's now your job to lure more trainers into the team.
Clone factory members: {0}
{0} has joined the team!
{0} and Mewtwo was sent to lure {1}... but no one was home!
Team Rocket has fallen but the remainding trainers are all with the clone factory! Clone factory with their clone Mewtwo has won!!!
Mew went to look for {0}'s Pokémon, but they are already fainted!
Mew went to look for {0} and found out that he/she owned a cloned Mewtwo! Mew release Mewtwo from {0}!
Mew went to look for {0} and found out that he/she owned normal Pokémon! Mew was relief and returned peacefully.
{0}'s senpai had just lost a Pokémon Battle! {0} lost all hopes and joined the Team Rocket!
{0} has lost a Pokémon Battle! Losing all hope, you chose to join Team Rocket! Your new teammates are: {1}

Your newest member heads over to {0} and try to lure them into the team with Mewtwo. But you found out their Pokémon have just fainted and lose all motivation to have another Pokémon.

No Alakazam 👳!
Time's up!
You owned a Haunter 🏹. You can choose two trainers Pokémon and cast Destiny Bond for both Pokémon. When one Pokémon fainted, the other follows.
You owned a Ditto 🎭. Choose a trainer. When his/her Pokémon fainted, Ditto can Transform into the trainer's Pokémon and join their team if they have one.
You owned a Gengar 🎯. A pro trainer you are. You may win the battle against Team Rocket and also cast a move before Gengar run away or lose the battle.
You are the Pokémon Master that owns a Dragonite 🔪. Your goal is to win all Pokémon Battle and be the best there ever was.
Destiny Bond is casted on your Pokémon! If {0}'s Pokémon lose a Pokémon battle and fainted, your Pokémon will faint too!
The town has chosen to release your Gengar! Give your last command to Gengar for a last Pokémon battle before it is released!
{0} command Gengar to cast Shadow Punch but too late, Gengar have been release into the wild and fainted.
{0} choose not to give his last command to Gengar. Gengar have been release into the wild and fainted.
Before Gengar is release to the wild, {0} command Gengar to cast Shadow Punch! Gengar used Shadow Punch! {2} fainted and {1} blackout.
Gengar is being release back to the wild! Give him your last command for a last Pokémon Battle with another trainer!
{0}'s Gengar fainted before he/she is able to give any command to his Pokémon.
{0} delayed his command for a while. Knowing that he will lose the battle, didn't give any command to Gengar
{0} command Gengar to cast Curse! While Gengar fainted, {1} was sad as {2} fainted along with him.
{0} ordered Mewtwo to attack {1}! However, not knowing the other trainer's strength and Pokémon. Dragonite appeared! Dragonite used Outrage! Mewtwo fainted.
Team Rocket had tried to fight a Pokémon Battle with Gengar! However, {0}'s experience is not strong enough and lost the battle.
Team Rocket had tried to fight a Pokémon Battle with Gengar! However, {0}'s experience is not strong enough and lost the battle.
Team Rocket had tried to fight a Pokémon Battle with Dragonite! However, Dragonite was too powerful and {0} lost the battle even tho Team Rocket have 3 legendary birds. What a shame!
The Pokémon master is running around initiating battles with his Dragonite! Unfortunately, he found {0}! {0} lost miserably with his {1}.
You and Dragonite head over to {0} and challenge him to a Pokémon battle. Mr. Mime came out of nowhere and cast Barrier, they are gone.. You didn't get your battle.
Team Rocket sends {0} to try to lure {1} into the team, but instead {1} was angry and ask Gengar to initiate a Pokémon battle! {0} lost with his/her Mewtwo fainted.
Team Rocket sends {0} to try to lure {1} into the team, but instead {1} was angry and ask Dragonite to initiate a Pokémon battle! {0} lost with his/her Mewtwo fainted.
Mr. Mime tried to cast Barrier on Dragonite but Dragonite casted Outrage on Mr. Mime before that! Mr. Mime fainted.
Jigglypuff went to {0} wanting to befriend the trainer's Pokémon. Little did Jigglypuff know that {0} is hungry for battle. Jigglypuff lost the battle and fainted.
don't worry about this {0} string for now! - {0}
{0}'s Ditto has now transform into Pikachu and joined the club!
{0}'s Pikachu has fainted, and Ditto transform into Pikachu. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
{0}'s Ditto has now transform into Mewtwo and joined the team!
{0}'s Mewtwo has fainted, and Ditto transform into Mewtwo. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
{0}'s Ditto has now transform into one of the legendary birds and joined the team!
{0}'s Pokémon has fainted, and Ditto transform into one of the legendary birds. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
You have won all Pokémon battle, You are the true Pokémon MASTER!!!

With {0}'s Pokémon fainted, {1} was shocked as {2} also fainted as they are both casted with Destiny Bond.

A new game is starting in {0}
{0} with his/her Dragonite, initiate a final Pokémon battle. However, {1}'s Pokémon is unable to win that overwhelming power of the Dragonite. {0} won the final battle.
None of the trainers are left..

The final Pokémon Battle between {0} and {1}. {0} send out Dragonite and {1} send out Gengar. Gengar casted Destiny Bond on both himself and Dragonite! While Dragonite use the final blow~, both Pokémon fainted. =_=
You failed to choose a senpai, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
{0}'s Pokémon has been released to the wild for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf.
You are the Seer. In this role, each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow trainers. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill! Note:if you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to attack the next night as you sleep off your hangover! If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next night, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other trainers (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living trainers are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two trainers at the start of the game. These two trainers will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if both lovers are alive at the end, and at least one of them was on the winning team, they both win together

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
